Package classifier

Class AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier

java.lang.Object
classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
LLBayesianNetworkClassifier, MDLBayesianNetworkClassifier
public abstract class AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier
This class implements a Tree Augmented Naive Bayes Classifier, with a N_prime value of 0.5. This type of classifier uses a tree whose nodes are the attributes of the dataset to make the classifications. All the methods necessary are already implemented, except the method to compute the weights between two attributes. This method must be implemented in a concrete class that extends this abstract class.

      protected int computeNijkc​(Attribute i, Attribute i_prime, int j, int k, int c)

      i_prime - second attribute
      j - value of i_prime

      c - value of the class
